website_summaries.verdict: This enamel toothpaste consistently moisturizes and soothes soft tissues in the mouth.
pros: Formula is designed to increase protection against tooth sensitivity over time
Offers mild cleaning to remove debris and residual surface stains
Boasts a satisfying mint breeze flavor
Provides a terrific option for people who are prone to cavities
cons: Tends to foam more frequently than other enamel toothpastes
May leave the mouth feeling dry after use

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dentist and use this product routinely. Research shows the material does help strengthen enamel to some degree, and it tastes nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brad4d

customer_reviews.title: still got cavities and teeth are super sensitive to heat, cold and sugar
customer_reviews.text: Super expensive toothpaste recommended by my dentist. Tastes bad on first try, but got used to it eventually. Foam a lot. Has been using it for months, still got cavities and teeth are super sensitive to heat, cold and sugar. Will continue to use it for another year to see if things get better.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Avoid fillings?
customer_reviews.text: If you use too much of this product it can cause discoloring of the teeth, but guess what? I used a lot of this frequently and it somehow enabled me to only need half the fillings considering all the cavities I had before using this product Did it cure some of my cavities? It baffled my dentist!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Pricey!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dentist. Bit "chalky" consistency that took some getting used to. Even my dentist uses it and admitted to needing time to acclimate to it. Expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Joan K.

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay, I don't care for the taste, it is a metallic taste. Also it hurts my teeth at first. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Lavold

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by my dental hygienists
customer_reviews.text: Dental hygienist told me to use this. I’m on my second tube.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dunn

customer_reviews.title: May work but tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: My dental hygienist recommended this so it may be good but I couldn’t stomach the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: good product!
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this for my teeth since my teeth easily get cavities. I personally think it's helped to at least slow down cavity formations (not sure I'd have to see recent xrays haha). The taste is strong and bitter at first but you quickly get used to it. Good product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Zeina

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the one my Dentist recommended. Who am I to argue?
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: This seems to have changed. It doesn’t work as well as it used to. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful and Refreshing Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste, it's super refreshing. Unfortunately this early on I can't attest to the products claims of enamel building since I've only had it for less than a month but if there is any noticeable change in my enamel then I'll be sure to come back and post an updated review.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ayala

customer_reviews.title: I like the toothpaste and the taste is okay
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it does remineralization on enamel and I was recommended this toothpaste by a dentist
customer_reviews.author: LINDSEY

customer_reviews.title: Keep on brushing for that beautiful smile!
customer_reviews.text: The fluoride toothpaste was recommended by my dentist. Taste lost one star. Better price at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: PA Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Tongue Tingle
customer_reviews.text: The product made my tongue tingle and burn unpleasantly. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Otto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is awful, however our Dentist HIGHLY recommended it, leaves our mouth feeling super clean!
customer_reviews.author: AliciaH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best sensitive tooth ever. Hugw difference from store bought tooth paste. NO more pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: The taste was not the best, and a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Crofut

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a toothpaste that has no mint flavor
customer_reviews.text: I needed a toothpaste without any flovor but it was worth taking a chance.
customer_reviews.author: joseph johnston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste was recommended by by dental hygienist. It didn’t have the hydrogen peroxide that can irritate gums.
customer_reviews.author: L Brown

customer_reviews.title: enamelon toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: It's too early too tell, but it spreads well and is a nice consistency.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Keeping a great product good
customer_reviews.text: The flavor in this tube seemed a little off in comparison to others I’ve had
customer_reviews.author: Peggypeace

customer_reviews.title: Not outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a "gummy" texture. Other than that, it does the job, but not exceptional considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toothpaste for sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Our dentist recommended we use this specialized toothpaste instead of the regular store brands to assist with tooth sensitivity. We went ahead with the recommendation and bought the toothpaste from the dentist's office for $27. When we neared then end of the tube, my hubby asked me to check Amazon and voila, here it is and just in time. When we received it, we compared it to the one we got from the dentist and it's the same exact one for HALF the price! This toothpaste has helped with our tooth sensitivity and we will continue use it but purchase it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: It works and was actually recommended by my dentist (really...)
customer_reviews.text: So i'm not a huge fan of the flavor but you get used to it. I feel like it is a bit pricy for how much I get so not exactly value here. However my dentist actually did recommend this and I've not yet had a toothpaste where my dentist recommended to me where it felt honest and not just a plus sell if you catch my meaning... I have to admit that it works and likely will be purchasing again begrudgingly (ugh...the price, flavor, sigh...it works)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah B. Commons

customer_reviews.title: great for gingivitis protection
customer_reviews.text: In regard to taste, it's similar to the Enamelon Gel which is slightly minty, but nothing like your regular old commercial off-the-shelf toothpaste. After you use it for a while, you won't even remember what the regular toothpaste tasted like. I pair this with the Gel and it's been great for keeping plaque, decay and bad breath away.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey W

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Hygienist
customer_reviews.text: I was referred to this product by my dental hygienist, and within 6 months I saw less staining so i'm happy and so is my dental hygienist. The product from what I've seen only comes in one size so you have to check this in when you travel and it's expensive compared to other toothpastes in the market but since it works, you can't really put a price to a quality smile. I recommend using this product after you brush your teeth with your regular toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shah

customer_reviews.title: tOOTHPASTE
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell a difference between this and C. toothpaste. My teeth just feel stronger after using Enamelon. I like it so much better. I am ever so grateful I can get it through Amazon as it is no longer available at the grocery store here.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I admit that I was skeptical, but happy to report that this toothpaste is AMAZING! Directions state that you should only use up to 4 weeks. The pain and sensitivity were gone within a week. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Went to the dentist office for my cleaning and hygienist said I had done a great job, that my teeth had very little to clean. Best ever!
customer_reviews.author: Dana K McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Glad its back
customer_reviews.text: Enamelon was gone for years and I'm glad it's back - it is one of the best toothpaste brands on the market
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite for sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but I use a small amount with an electric and it controls sensitivity very well. Yet to find anything better, but haven't looked hard.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED BY DENTIST
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste was recommended by dentist. My wife had oral cancer and dentist wanted to protect her teeth after radiation and chemotherapy. My wife like the taste and how well it cleans her teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Herman F. Dunn III

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Minty, but has a very weird, metallic aftertaste that lingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dentist Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommends this product to prevent cavities. My checkups have been great with no cavities for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: RDC

customer_reviews.title: Enamelon Fluoride Toothpaste is Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years and am quite pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: So far this is helping with my sensitivity issue. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this is helping with my sensitivity issue. I use it twice a day. Sned me a note for more info if you want
customer_reviews.author: Mnstargazer

customer_reviews.title: My dentist recommends
customer_reviews.text: this product works well - do not rinse after using
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Isackson

customer_reviews.title: Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Does horrible at first but leaves teeth so clean and squeaky...
customer_reviews.author: My Boys To Love

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the Professional's "go to" toothpaste for dry mouth, sensitivity and caries prevention
customer_reviews.author: bap

customer_reviews.title: I loved this toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Years ago when Enamelon was in the stores, I loved this toothpaste. It left my teeth feeling clean & like they had a fresh "coating" or protection for lack of a better word. This toothpaste leaves my mouth feeling dry & my tongue tingles for awhile after brushing. Maybe they've changed their formula? In any case, I'm not sure if it's worth spending another $12.00 for. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Foster

product_meta.title: Premier Enamelon Fluoride Toothpaste 4.3 oz (122 g) Mint Breeze (1 tube)
product_meta.description: Clinically proven active ingredient for Anticavity, Antigingivitis & Sensitive Teeth 2-way protection power: 0.45% Stannous Fluoride (1150 ppm F) & Amorphous Calcium Phosphate Patented Ultramulsion formula moisturizes and soothes dry mouth tissues Mint Breeze flavor No Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), No Gluten, No Dyes
feature_bullets: Clinically Proven Active Ingredient For Anticavity, Antigingivitis and Sensitive Teeth
Ultramulsion is a patented saliva-soluble coating that moisturizes and soothes soft tissues of the mouth.
Mint Breeze flavor enhanced with spilanthes, a natural herb which can boost saliva flow and flavor
No Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), No Gluten, No Dyes
